attributes.action: To have a permanent speed camera Put in Madresfield village Malvern
attributes.additional_details: 2 very loved pets have been killed On the same road by hit and runs in less then a week because of speeding and people not caring. A speed camera needs to be put in the village because next time it could be a human or worse a child as there is a primary school in the village.
attributes.background: People don’t abide by the speed limit going through Madresfield village which has caused great heartbreak for my family and I as my parents cat was involved in a hit and run and was killed instantly because the driver was going too fast.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council. You can find out more here: https://www.malvernhills.gov.uk/about-your-council/your-local-council/petitions
